Params: {3: 'The great waves shatter as the vessel of pure desire and bitter hatred finally wanes.'}
{3: 'Gasping heavily, Lamia can no longer maintain her form as she sinks beneath the waters.'}
{3: "Guess it's all coming to an end now..."}
{3: 'A sudden mix of relief and uncertainty washes over Lamia.'}
{3: 'Is that person safe now? What kind of world will she wake up to?'}
{3: "Lamia knows nothing more, wanting only to close her eyes. Through her eyelids, she feels the light fading away as she sinks deeper into the ocean's depths."}
{3: 'An otherworldly sound, one that should not exist beneath the waves, suddenly reaches her ears. Lamia opens her eyes in confusion.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Looks like it didn't affect you... I'm just happy... to see you safe...", 18: '100003924'}
{3: "Lamia's voice grows increasingly fragile, as her body, too, starts to fade."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Guess this means... that I don't have much time left...?", 18: '100003925'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I see... Well... can I ask one last question, then?', 18: '100003926'}
{3: 'Lamia swallows hard, her voice wavering, yet she manages to force a smile.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'So... I was just wondering... if... cough... cough, cough... if you were happy...', 18: '100003927'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'During those two days... after I brought you back home from the sea...', 18: '100003928'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I see... I'll try harder to make you happy next time, then.", 18: '100003929'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "That's good, then... This world didn't exist for nothing, at least.", 18: '100003931'}
{3: "Lamia's voice grows ever more distant, until..."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'If this is a dream... then I hope I can still remember this... when I wake up...', 18: '100003932'}
{3: 'Her words dissolves completely into the ocean breeze.'}
